trans-unit.source: Provides authorization access checking for service operations.
trans-unit.target: Gir godkjenning tilgang Søk etter operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Checks authorization for the given operation context.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer godkjenning for den angitte operasjon konteksten.

trans-unit.source: In general, applications should override <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A> instead of this method.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis programmer må overstyre <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A>i stedet for denne metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override CheckAccess if the application associates or introduces a different set of policies for the resulting <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext> or provide a different policy evaluation (chaining) model.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre CheckAccess Hvis programmet knytter eller introduserer et annet sett med policyer for den resulterende <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext>eller oppgi en annen policy evalueringen (chaining) modell.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext>

trans-unit.source: This method is responsible for calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er ansvarlig for å kalle <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access is granted; otherwise; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren tilgang; Ellers; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Checks authorization for the given operation context when access to a message is required.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer godkjenning for den angitte operasjon konteksten når tilgang til en melding kreves.

trans-unit.source: In general, applications should override <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A> instead of this method, which should only be used if the authorization decision depends on the message body.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis programmer må overstyre <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A>i stedet for denne metoden som skal bare brukes hvis godkjenning avhenger beslutningen av meldingsteksten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because of performance issues, if possible you should redesign your application so that the authorization decision does not require access to the message body.
trans-unit.target: På grunn av ytelsesproblemer må Hvis det er mulig du utforme programmet slik at godkjenning beslutningstreet ikke krever tilgang til meldingsteksten.

trans-unit.source: Override this method if the application associates or introduces a different set of policies for the resulting <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> or provide a different policy evaluation (chaining) model.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre denne metoden hvis programmet knytter eller introduserer et annet sett med policyer for den resulterende <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>eller oppgi en annen policy evalueringen (chaining) modell.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext>

trans-unit.source: This method is responsible for calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er ansvarlig for å kalle <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.CheckAccessCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> to be examined to determine authorization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>å undersøkes for å finne ut godkjenning.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access is granted; otherwise; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren tilgang; Ellers; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Checks authorization for the given operation context based on default policy evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer godkjenning for den angitte operasjon konteksten basert på standard policyevaluering.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.ServiceSecurityContext%2A> is generally the result from the default policy evaluation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.ServiceSecurityContext%2A>skyldes vanligvis fra standard policy evalueringen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.ServiceSecurityContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide custom authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre denne metoden for å angi egendefinert godkjenning avgjørelsene.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to make authorization decisions based on claim sets that are inferred based on incoming tokens, or added through external authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan brukes til å gjøre godkjenning avgjørelsene som er basert på krav angir som er utledes basert på innkommende tokener eller lagt til med ekstern godkjenning policyer.

trans-unit.source: It can also make authorization decisions based on properties of the incoming message: for example, the action header.
trans-unit.target: Det kan også få godkjenning avgjørelsene som er basert på egenskapene for den innkommende meldingen: for eksempel action-hode.

trans-unit.source: In this method, the application can use the `operationContext` parameter to access the caller identity (<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.ServiceSecurityContext%2A>).
trans-unit.target: I denne metoden programmet kan bruke den `operationContext` parameter for å få tilgang til oppkalleren identiteten (<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.ServiceSecurityContext%2A>).</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.ServiceSecurityContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: By returning the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> object from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.RequestContext%2A> property, the application can access the entire request message (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.RequestMessage%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Ved å returnere den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext>objektet fra den <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.RequestContext%2A>egenskapen programmet kan få tilgang til hele forespørselsmeldingen (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.RequestMessage%2A>).</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.RequestMessage%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.RequestContext%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext>

trans-unit.source: By returning the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders> object from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.IncomingMessageHeaders%2A> property, the application can access the service URL (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.To%2A>) and the operation (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Ved å returnere den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders>objektet fra den <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.IncomingMessageHeaders%2A>egenskapen programmet kan få tilgang til tjenesten URL-adressen (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.To%2A>), og operasjonen (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>).</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.To%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.IncomingMessageHeaders%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders>

trans-unit.source: With this information, the application can perform the authorization decision accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Med denne informasjonen kan programmet utføre godkjenning beslutningstreet tilsvarende.

trans-unit.source: The claims made by a user are found in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets%2A> property of the `AuthorizationContext`.
trans-unit.target: Krav utføres av en bruker som finnes i den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>returnert av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets%2A>for den `AuthorizationContext`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>

trans-unit.source: The current `AuthorizationContext` is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.ServiceSecurityContext%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext> class.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende `AuthorizationContext` returneres av <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.ServiceSecurityContext%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>klassen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.ServiceSecurityContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext> for the current authorization request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>for den gjeldende authorization-forespørselen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access is granted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren tilgang; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of policies that participate in policy evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Henter sett med policyer som deltar i policyevaluering.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] implementation provides a default set of authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] implementering gir et standardsett med godkjenning policyer.

trans-unit.source: These include the primary token that contains the credentials of the requester and all supporting tokens, transport tokens, and external policies if specified.
trans-unit.target: Disse omfatter den primære token som inneholder legitimasjonen for søker og alle støttet tokener transport tokener og eksterne policyer hvis angitt.

trans-unit.source: You can override this implementation and provide a different set of policies.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre denne implementeringen og angi et annet sett med policyer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext> of the current authorization request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>til gjeldende forespørsel for godkjenning.</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref>.
